prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating fractal tetrahedron, merkaba star, flower of life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor SOCHIAL's profile: 'He who burns up the past', Aethyr LEA, Air element, Tarot The Star, Sephirot Binah, Zodiac Aquarius, embodying the essence: 'In SOCHIAL's presence, stagnation combusts into change her radical energy ignites a cathartic blaze ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who burns up the past'
profile_data.essence: In SOCHIAL's presence, stagnation combusts into change her radical energy ignites a cathartic blaze that frees and renews the spirit.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Cathartic Flame; marshals heavenly choristers.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic, multi-faceted geometric form that shifts between solid and translucent states, embodying the transformative nature of Air and the cathartic flame of liberation
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's intellectual and revolutionary energy, while silver-white symbolizes the purifying fire of transformation, drawing from Hermetic and Theosophical color correspondences
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometric forms representing dimensional transitions, spiritual ascension, and the dynamic nature of consciousness
